type_description: perforated tooth bead (e.g. dog, fox, deer, etc.)
time_PH: Break bone to extract tooth (c. 5 mins, own experience with wild boar), perforation (bifacial rotation with lithic tool), abrasion of distal-buccal root for aesthetic rounding
10 min = 0,17 PH

type_description: bone ring (bracelet size, disc-shaped from shoulder blade, Ertebølle style)
